text: niyata vaśayenma kavurun hō pratikṣēpa kara, allāhgē mārgayehi (yāmada) vaḷakvā, (makkāva vana) ehi vāsaya karannan vuvada, piṭata vāsaya karannan vuvada, minisun siyallanṭama samāna vana paridden api æti kaḷa pariśuddha vū næmadumpaḷaṭa yāmada vaḷakvā, (dharmayaṭa) paṭahæniva aparādha kirīmaṭa adahas kaḷahot ovunṭa vēdanā gena dena dan̆ḍuvama vin̆dina lesaṭa api salasvannemu
